summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新数据源的一组 SQL 命令和一个数据库连接。

span.span: Represents a set of SQL commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 充当用于检索和保存数据的 与数据源之间的桥梁。The serves as a bridge between a and a data source for retrieving and saving data. 通过映射 来提供此桥，这将更改 中的数据以匹配数据源中的数据，并将更改数据源中的数据，使其与 中的数据相匹配。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the . 如果要连接到 SQL Server 数据库，则可以通过使用 连同关联的 和 对象，提高整体性能。If you are connecting to a SQL Server database, you can increase overall performance by using the along with its associated and objects. 对于 OLE DB 支持的数据源，请将 与其关联的 和 对象结合使用。For OLE DB-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. 对于支持 ODBC 的数据源，请将 与其关联的 和 对象一起使用。For ODBC-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. 对于 Oracle 数据库，将 与其关联的 和 对象一起使用。For Oracle databases, use the with its associated and objects. 当创建 的实例时，读/写属性将设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对 `DataAdapter`的 `Update` 方法的调用过程中，数据库可以将数据作为输出参数发送回 ADO.NET 应用程序，或将其作为结果集的第一个返回记录返回。During a call to the `Update` method of a `DataAdapter`, the database can send data back to your ADO.NET application as output parameters or as the first returned record of a result set. ADO.NET 可以检索这些值并在要更新的 中更新相应的列。ADO.NET can retrieve these values and update the corresponding columns in the being updated. 默认情况下，ADO.NET 将在更新后调用 `DataRow` 的 `AcceptChanges` 方法。By default, ADO.NET calls the `AcceptChanges` method of the `DataRow` after the update. 但是，如果想要将更新的行合并回另一个 ，则可能需要保留主键列的原始值。However, if you want to merge the updated row back into another , you may want to preserver the original value of a primary key column. 例如，与数据库中自动递增的列（例如，标识列）相对应的主键列可以包含与 `DataRow`中分配的原始值不匹配的新值。For example, a primary key column corresponding to an automatically incrementing column in the database, such as an identity column, can contain new values that are assigned by the database that do not match the original values assigned in the `DataRow`. 默认情况下，`AcceptChanges` 是在更新后隐式调用的，并且行中的原始值（可能已 ADO.NET 分配的值）将丢失。By default, `AcceptChanges` is called implicitly after an update, and the original values in the row, which may have been values assigned by ADO.NET, are lost. 您可以通过将 属性设置为 `false`来保留原始值，从而在 `DataRow` 中保留原始值，方法是防止 `ADO.NET` 在对行执行更新后调用 `AcceptChanges`。You can preserve the original values in the `DataRow` by preventing `ADO.NET` from calling `AcceptChanges` after it performs an update on a row, by setting the property to `false`, which preserves the original values. > [!NOTE] > 将 `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` 属性设置为 `false` 适用于所有数据修改，而不只是 insert。Setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property to `false` applies to all data modifications, not only inserts. 如果要在同一更新中编辑或删除行，并且想要取消对 `AcceptChanges` 的调用，而不是将 `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` 设置为 `false`，请使用事件处理程序来处理 `DataAdapter`的 `RowUpdated` 事件。If you want to edit or delete rows in the same update, and if you want to suppress the call to `AcceptChanges` only for inserts, then instead of setting `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` to `false`, use an event handler for the `RowUpdated` event of the `DataAdapter`. 在事件处理程序中，您可以检查 来确定数据修改是否为插入，如果 `true`，则将 的 属性设置为 。In the event handler, you can check the to determine if the data modification is an insert, and if `true`, set the property of the to . 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[检索标识或自动编号值](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values)。For more information and an example, see [Retrieving Identity or Autonumber Values](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values). ## Examples 此示例演示从 `DataTable` 中提取已更改的行，然后使用 更新数据源并检索新标识列值。This example demonstrates extracting changed rows from a `DataTable` and using a to update the data source and retrieve a new identity column value. 通过将 的 `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` 属性设置为 `false` 保留原始的自动增量值，即使新的标识值与 `DataTable`中的原始自动增量值不匹配，也可以将新数据合并到原始的 中。By setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property of the to `false` to preserve the original auto increment value, the new data can then be merged into the original , even if the new identity value does not match the original auto increment value in the `DataTable`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建此 实例的一个副本。

span.span: Creates a copy of this instance of .
The cloned instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不推荐使用此方法。This method is deprecated. 应使用 构造函数，而不是使用此方法。The constructor should be used instead of this method. 将克隆所有命令、、和 。All the commands, the , the , and the are cloned. 但是，这些命令的连接不会被复制，而是共享的。However, the connections for the commands are not copied, but shared. 因此，可以对与原始 相同的连接使用克隆的。Thus, the cloned can be used against the same connection as the original.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在行更新过程中遇到错误时是否生成异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to generate an exception when an error is encountered during a row update.

value.span: 如果要继续更新而不生成异常，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: to continue the update without generating an exception; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `ContinueUpdateOnError` 设置为 `true`，则在更新行的过程中发生错误时不会引发异常。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `true`, no exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row. 将跳过行的更新，并将错误信息置于错误的行的 属性中。The update of the row is skipped and the error information is placed in the property of the row in error. 继续更新后续行。The continues to update subsequent rows. 如果 `ContinueUpdateOnError` 设置为 `false`，则在更新行的过程中发生错误时将引发异常。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `false`, an exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在之前对 的调用中已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 在 中添加或刷新行以与数据源中的行匹配。

span.span: Adds or refreshes rows in the to match those in the data source.

returns.span: 已在 中成功添加或刷新的行数。

span.span: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the .

returns.span: 这不包括受不返回行的语句影响的行。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用关联的 属性指定的 SELECT 语句从数据源中检索行。The method retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. 与 SELECT 语句关联的连接对象必须有效，但不需要打开。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果在调用 之前关闭连接，则会打开该连接，以检索数据，然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果在调用 之前连接处于打开状态，则该连接将保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 然后 操作将行添加到 中的目标 对象，并创建 对象（如果它们尚不存在）。The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 创建 对象时， 操作通常只创建列名称元数据。When creating objects, the operation normally creates only column name metadata. 但是，如果 属性设置为 `AddWithKey`，则还会创建相应的主键和约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 必须显式定义主键，以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys). 如果数据适配器在填充 时遇到重复的列，则使用 "columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3" 等模式为后续列生成名称。If the data adapter encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入数据包含未命名列，则这些列将按照模式 "Column1"、"Column2" 等放置在 中。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当将多个结果集添加到 时，每个结果集将放在一个单独的表中。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 附加的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名来命名（例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2" 等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保不会与这些命名模式发生冲突。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 当用于填充 的 SELECT 语句返回多个结果（如批处理 SQL 语句）时，如果其中一个结果包含错误，则会跳过所有后续结果，并且不会将其添加到 中。When the SELECT statement used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statements, if one of the results contains an error, all subsequent results are skipped and not added to the . 您可以在同一 上多次使用 方法。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果存在主键，则传入行与已存在的匹配行合并在一起。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果主键不存在，将在 中追加传入行。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 当处理返回多个结果的批处理 SQL 语句时，OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序 的实现仅检索第一个结果的架构信息。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要检索多个结果的架构信息，请使用 ，并将 设置为 `AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler FillError;
.event class System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler FillError
Public Custom Event FillError As FillErrorEventHandler
public: event System::Data::FillErrorEventHandler ^ FillError;
member this.FillError : System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler

summary.span: 在填充操作过程中出现错误时返回。

span.span: Returned when an error occurs during a fill operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用**FillError**事件，用户可以确定在错误发生后是否应继续执行填充操作。The **FillError** event allows a user to determine whether or not the fill operation should continue after the error occurs. **FillError**事件可能发生的情况的示例如下：Examples of when the **FillError** event might occur are: - 要添加到 `DataSet` 中的数据无法转换为公共语言运行时类型，且不会丢失精度。The data being added to a `DataSet` cannot be converted to a common language runtime type without losing precision. - 要添加的行包含的数据违反了必须对 `DataSet`中的 `DataColumn` 强制执行的约束。The row being added contains data that violates a Constraint that must be enforced on a `DataColumn` in the `DataSet`.

Public MustOverride Function FillSchema (dataSet As DataSet, schemaType As SchemaType) As DataTable()

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要用数据源中的架构填充的 。

span.span: The to be filled with the schema from the data source.

param.name: schemaType
param.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 将 添加到指定的 中，并根据指定的 配置架构以匹配数据源中的架构。

span.span: Adds a to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: 包含从数据源返回的架构信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用 从数据源检索架构。The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 与 关联的连接对象必须有效，但不需要打开。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果在调用 之前关闭连接，则会打开该连接，以检索数据，然后将其关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data and then closed. 如果在调用 之前连接处于打开状态，则该连接将保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 操作向目标 添加 。A operation adds a to the destination . 然后，将列添加到 的 中，并配置以下 属性（如果它们存在于数据源中）：It then adds columns to the of the , and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - 列中的一个值匹配。. 您必须单独设置 和 。You must set and separately. - - - 还根据以下规则配置 和 属性： also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果 返回一个或多个主键列，则将它们用作 的主键列。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果未返回主键列但唯一列为，则当且仅当不可 null 所有唯一列时，才将唯一列用作主键。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable. 如果任何列可为 null，则会将 添加到 ，但不会设置 属性。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果为主键列和唯一列都返回，则主键列将用作 的主键列。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . > [!NOTE] > 基础数据存储可能会允许 不支持的列属性，这将导致某些列属性无法正确转换。The underlying data store may allow column attributes that are not supported in a , which causes some column attributes to not translate correctly. 例如，SQL Server 允许数据类型为 tinyint 的标识列，而 只允许 Int16、Int32 和 Int64 设置 属性。For example, SQL Server allows an identity column with a data type of tinyint whereas a only allows Int16, Int32, and Int64 to have the property set. `FillSchema` 以无提示方式忽略 无法准确镜像数据源并且不引发异常的情况。`FillSchema` silently ignores cases where the cannot accurately mirror the data source and throws no exception. 请注意，根据前面的规则将主键和 unique 约束添加到 中，但不会添加其他约束类型。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果在 SQL Server 表中的一列或多列上定义了唯一聚集索引，并且在一组单独的列上定义了 primary key 约束，则将返回聚集索引中的列的名称。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要返回主键列的名称，请使用带有指定主键索引名称的 SELECT 语句的查询提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 有关指定查询提示的详细信息，请参阅[提示（transact-sql）-查询](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query)。For more information about specifying query hints, see [Hints (Transact-SQL) - Query](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query). 如果 在填充 时遇到重复的列，则它将使用模式 "*columnname*1"、"*columnname*2"、"*columnname*3" 等来为后续列生成名称。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果传入数据包含未命名列，则这些列将按照模式 "Column1"、"Column2" 等放置在 中。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当将多个结果集添加到 时，每个结果集将放在一个单独的表中。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 附加的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名来命名（例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2" 等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称的应用程序应确保不会与这些命名模式发生冲突。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 不返回任何行。 does not return any rows. 使用 方法将行添加到 中。Use the method to add rows to a . > [!NOTE] > 当处理返回多个结果的批处理 SQL 语句时，OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序 的实现仅检索第一个结果的架构信息。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要检索多个结果的架构信息，请使用 ，并将 设置为 `AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 协调更改时， 使用 集合将数据源所使用的列名与 使用的列名称关联。When reconciling changes, the uses the collection to associate the column names used by the data source with the column names used by the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生类 向其 集合添加 对象，并显示这些映射的源表的列表。The following example uses a derived class, , to add objects to its collection and display a list of those mapped source tables. 此示例假设已创建 。This example assumes that an has already been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从名为“Table”的 为指定的 中每个已插入、已更新或已删除的行调用相应的 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句。

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table."
The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更新按行执行。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 对于每个插入行、已修改行和已删除行， 方法将确定对其执行的更改类型（Insert、Update 或 Delete）。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (Insert, Update or Delete). 根据更改的类型，将执行 `Insert`、`Update,` 或 `Delete` 命令模板，以将已修改的行传播到数据源。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update,` or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 当应用程序调用 方法时， 将检查 属性，并根据在 中配置的索引的顺序对每个行执行所需的 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句。When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如， 可能会执行 DELETE 语句，后跟 INSERT 语句，然后执行另一 DELETE 语句，因为 中的行的顺序。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, due to the ordering of the rows in the . 应注意的是，这些语句不作为批处理执行;每一行都单独更新。It should be noted that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 如果必须控制语句类型的顺序（例如，在 UPDATE 之前插入），则应用程序可以调用 方法。An application can call the method in situations where you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERT before UPDATE). 有关详细信息，请参阅[用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句， 方法将生成一个异常。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 不过，如果设置 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的 `SelectCommand` 属性，则可以创建 或 对象以自动为单表更新生成 SQL 语句。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后， **CommandBuilder**将生成未设置的任何其他 SQL 语句。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the **CommandBuilder**. 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于 中。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders). 在执行更新之前， 方法从第一个映射中列出的表中检索行。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然后， 使用 属性的值刷新该行。The then refreshes the row using the value of the property. 将忽略返回的任何其他行。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 将任何数据加载回 后，将引发 事件，从而允许用户检查已协调的 行和该命令返回的任何输出参数。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 成功更新行后，将接受对该行所做的更改。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 使用 时，执行顺序如下所示：When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值将移至参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果命令设置为 `FirstReturnedRecord`，则将第一个返回的结果放置在 中。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果有输出参数，它们会置于 中。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. 这将引发更新 的 和 事件。This will raise both the and events for the updated . 与 关联的每个命令通常都具有与之关联的参数集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameters collection associated with it. 参数通过 .NET 数据提供程序的 `Parameter` 类的 `SourceColumn` 和 `SourceVersion` 属性映射到当前行。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn` 指 为获取当前行的参数值而引用的 列。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. 在应用任何表映射之前，`SourceColumn` 引用未映射的列名称。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果 `SourceColumn` 引用不存在的列，则执行的操作取决于下列 值之一。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |枚举值Enumeration value|执行的操作Action taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|如果不存在任何映射，请使用 中的源列名称和表名称。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|生成一个 。A is generated. 当显式设置映射时，缺少输入参数的映射通常是由错误引起的。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually the result of an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|生成一个 。A is generated.| `SourceColumn` 属性还用于将输出或输入/输出参数的值映射回 `DataSet`。The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果引用不存在的列，则会生成异常。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. .NET 数据提供程序的 `Parameter` 类的 `SourceVersion` 属性确定是否使用列值的原始版本、当前版本或建议版本。The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the Original, Current, or Proposed version of the column value. 此功能通常用于在 UPDATE 语句的 WHERE 子句中包含原始值，以检查是否存在开放式并发冲突。This capability is often used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. 调用 方法或 方法将提交 或 中的所有更改。Calling the method or method will commit all changes in the or . 如果在调用 方法之前调用这两个方法中的任何一个，则调用 方法时不会提交任何更改，除非从 或 调用以来进行了进一步的更改。If either of these methods are called before the method is called, no changes will be committed when the method is called, unless further changes have been made since or was called. > [!NOTE] > 如果在更新行时出现错误，则会引发异常并中止执行更新。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要在遇到错误时继续执行更新操作而不生成异常，请在调用 之前将 属性设置为 `true`。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 您还可以在 DataAdapter 的 `RowUpdated` 事件内每行响应错误。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要在 `RowUpdated` 事件中继续执行更新操作而不生成异常，请将 的 属性设置为 ""。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . > > 对于传播到 上的数据源的每个列，应将参数添加到 `InsertCommand`、`UpdateCommand`或 `DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. 应将参数的 `SourceColumn` 属性设置为列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 此设置指示参数的值不是手动设置的，而是从当前处理的行中的特定列获取的。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生类 来 数据源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The source table is invalid.

exception.span: 尝试执行 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，但没有记录受到影响。

span.span: An attempt to execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement resulted in zero records affected.
ADO.NET Overview
